revised_title: A Study of Snail Species and Their Shells
tldr: The author, Martin Lister, shares his research on various snail species and their shells. He discusses the differences between land and freshwater snails, their reproductive habits, and the potential medicinal uses of snails. Lister also explores the origins of snail shells and fossils, as well as the various methods used to study these creatures.
